text:
Hi everyone, I'd like to build a call & chat center app that agency can accept the customer's call & chat in HubSpot CRM.
As I know, similar apps like the Aircall and other apps are built by chrome extension.
Is there any other way to build this kind of app without using the chrome extension?
Hey there I would ask this in the <#C2YHAHB6K|api> channel, this is a channel for the community built developer chrome extension.
Thanks for your reply. let me ask it again in the <#C2YHAHB6K|api> channel.
maybe <http://retool.com|retool.com> is a solution you could try

Thanks for your advice.
These things are what I'd like to integrate into HubSpot crm.
1. place the call & chat button at bottom right of HubSpot crm.
2. if the agency click this button, then call & chat layout should be pop up.
3. In this layout, the agency can accept incoming call & chat from customer or can oubound call.
